script_score.script: doc["package.name.raw"].value.equals(text) ? 100000 + (doc["score.detail.popularity"].value * popularityWeight + doc["score.detail.quality"].value * qualityWeight + doc["score.detail.maintenance"].value * maintenanceWeight) : _score * pow((doc["score.detail.popularity"].value * popularityWeight + doc["score.detail.quality"].value * qualityWeight + doc["score.detail.maintenance"].value * maintenanceWeight), scoreEffect)
